description: Spice up lunchtime with baked sweet potato boats loaded with tasty toppings. Try this easy recipe for a healthier and budget-friendly lunch.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Video,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Peanut free
name: Roasted Sweet Potato with Crispy Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840g canned Woolworths no-added-salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained
0.5 small red onion, thinly sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Boil the kettle.
Place sweet potato, cut-side up, on one prepared tray and spray with oil. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden and tender.
Meanwhile, place chickpeas on remaining prepared tray. Spray with oil, then sprinkle with paprika and cumin and toss to coat. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and crispy.
Place spinach in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water. Stand for 1 minute or until wilted. Drain.
Top sweet potato halves with spinach, yoghurt, chickpeas and onion. Serve.
